seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation; responsibilities suggest mid-level (design, support, agile execution) without leadership or architecture ownership; no years specified but requirements are comprehensive for mid-level

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Data Engineer'; core responsibilities focus on ETL, data modeling, Spark, and cloud platforms

sub_specialty.evidence: Strong emphasis on ETL pipelines, data warehousing, and batch processing with Spark; Kafka mentioned but not as primary focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include 'provide regular support/guidance to project teams' but no mention of managing people, hiring, or architectural ownership; role is execution-focused

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Azure, and GCP all listed as 'preferred' with no primary specified; cloud platforms mentioned generically

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three clouds listed as preferred; no hierarchy or primary cloud indicated

processing_paradigm.evidence: Kafka (streaming) and Spark/ETL (batch) both mentioned; no emphasis on one over the other

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools (Airflow, Dagster, etc.) mentioned in requirements or description

storage_layer.evidence: HDFS (lake) and data warehousing concepts mentioned; cloud storage systems (S3/ADLS/GCS) implied but not specified

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India' with no remote flexibility mentioned; implies local/regional presence required

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India; no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Specific location given without remote option; implies candidate must be able to work from Bengaluru

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned; location is India, suggesting local hiring only

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas or OPT/CPT; location in India suggests local hiring

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement stated; location in India implies authorization to work locally is sufficient

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM is a large corporation; role described as full-time position in delivery center; no contract or freelance language

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in job posting or Pass 1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'continuous improvements' and 'latest technologies' but no specific career tracks, levels, or promotion paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'provide regular support/guidance to project teams' and working in delivery centers with technical expertise; suggests collaboration with senior staff

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in job description or requirements

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit mention of IC, management, or specialist tracks; inferred from IBM's typical structure but not stated

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills (Spark, Python, SQL, ETL) vs. nice-to-have (cloud platforms); balanced requirements without excessive 'must haves'

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering responsibilities: design, build, support, and improve data solutions; no hybrid roles mentioned

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Spark, Python, SQL, ETL, cloud) are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer; no unrealistic combinations or senior-level expectations
